location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Tod, Assistant Surgeon in Charge of the Bushire Residency to French, Commander of HMS Sophia

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has resulted in a hole in the fabric of the folio. As a result, the signature of the letter has been slightly obscured.

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding a copy of a communication (not present) from C F Hunter, owner of the Nadree. It is noted that the Nadreewas wrecked a few days previously.
